name: assemblyscript-incrementer-contract
description: Tetcore Incrementer Smart Contract written in AssemblyScript
author: Stefanie Doll

scripts.build:optimized: asc assembly/index.ts -b build/incrementer-raw.wasm -t build/incrementer-raw.wat  --runtime half --importMemory --use abort= --noAssert --optimize --initialMemory=16 --maximumMemory=16
scripts.build: yarn build:optimized && yarn build:tsd && yarn build:sh
